decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Non-Material Amendments
1. Addition of two velux rooflights to front roofslope and addition of rooflight above entrance roof
2. Introduction of front gate, external plant and bin and cycle storage

Reason : 1 - Within the context of planning application P/0665/21 granted on 03/09/2021, the proposed amendment would be different in its scale of fenestration and addition of bin, cycle storage, external plant and boundary changes, the development would result in a material change to the character and appearance of the host dwelling, street scene and wider area. It would therefore require re-consultation of neighbouring properties and stakeholders, and the proposal would need to be re-assessed against the requirements of Policy D3 of The London Plan (2021) and Policy DM1 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010). The proposal is therefore not considered to be non-material minor amendment.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission P/0665/21 dated 03/09/2021 to allow addition of velux rooflight atlower groud level over ground floor entrance; addition of two velux rooflights to loft; omission of post to entrance porch and plant space to side elevation; change of roof tiles from clay to concrete
